titleStmt.title: A true narration of that horrible conspiracy against King James and the whole Parliament of England, commonly called the gun-powder treason written in Latine by Jacobus Augustus Thuanus ... ; faithfully rendred into English.
titleStmt.author: Thou, Jacques-Auguste de, 1553-1617.
Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Translation by Edward Stephens [i.e., Socrates Christianus] of unidentified work in Latin. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
